page.title: 14THE VILLAGE HALL.
page.content: Before 1968 there used to be a wooden hut and you had to go outside to the toilet in the dark when a dance was on. There used to be a keep fit class and disco and judo. There is tap dancing in there every Tuesday now.At christmas the school have their annual party there and also a school concert/ play.There are parties for weddings etc. Some times there are meetings at the village hall.The new hall was made with brick, and concrete blocks.It was started in August 5th 1968 and opened March the 21st 1969 with a bingo session.Bricklaying was done by a contractor and the roof too.There was also a lot of voluntary work by Mr. Maul.It has a car park in front now. The hall is on the road just at the foot of the hill near chapel lane.
